title: American System: Carey's Protectionist Economics
description: Henry Charles Carey's protectionist alternative to British free trade, arguing for harmony between labor and capital through industrial development and tariff protection.
keyContributions: Carey: Harmony between labor and capital through industrial development
Unity of Law: Grand synthesis of physical, social, mental, and moral science
Protectionist alternative to British classical economics
researchValue: Represents the American protectionist tradition as counterpoint to British free trade economics. Carey's 'Unity of Law' attempts ambitious synthesis across all domains of knowledge.
